remarks: Define irrelexive relationship; relation R is irreflexive over the set A iff ` A. x e. A -. x R x ` .  Note that a relationship can be neither reflexive nor irreflexive.  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 1-Dec-2019.)
statement:
df-irreflexive $p |- ( R Irreflexive A <-> ( R C_ ( A X. A ) /\ A. x e. A -. x R x ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d R x $.
